channel.title: Shadowbane!
channel.description:
I was going to start playing this game when I was younger, but then I never had internet and I had no idea what an MMORPG was. Now that it is free, I'm going to start downloading the client tonight!
If anyone wants to play with me, that'd be cool.
Reminds me somewhat of DAoC...
http://chronicle.ubi.com/newspost.php?id=15088

item.title: Shadowbane!

Would love to download and see…but stupid download link…dont have an account there
